# Hi I'm Sam

I'm a web developer based in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

I build web applications of all shapes and sizes.

I'm an experienced PHP developer, and I'm constantly learning new systems and technologies.

Let's talk.

Email: [samuel@dersam.net](mailto:samuel@dersam.net)
Github: [dersam](https://github.com/dersam)
LinkedIn: [http://www.linkedin.com/in/samuelschmidt](http://www.linkedin.com/in/samuelschmidt)
